## Problem 1
### Part a
```{R}

library(ggplot2)
library(usmap)

plot_usmap(regions = "counties", include= c("CA")) + 
  labs(title = "US Counties",
       subtitle = "This is a blank map of the counties of the United States.") + 
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(color = "black", fill = "lightblue"))
```
